channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-3042] container-edit-jvm-options fails
item.description:
kit 103

JBossFuse:karaf@root> container-edit-jvm-options quickstart3 
JMX Login for quickstart3: admin
 
JMX Password for admin@quickstart3: 
Operation Failed. Check logs.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: FWIW, although I remain uncertain what "JMX login" means in fabric terms, the JMX MBean server does accept the credentials of the custom authentication module. So, for example, if I get the JMX URI by doing "container-info", then connect to that URI using jconsole, I can use credentials from my custom realm. But I can't do "container-edit-jvm-options -f" with those credentials, even though I am prompted for "JMX login."
